name: V.H.S : Video.Horror.Story
summary:
V.H.S is a first person horror game where the player can change the frequency of the camera to reveal either the environment or the monsters. But only one at a time.

V.H.S was made in 48h for the Global Game Jam 2017, at the Isart Digital in Paris. This is the post-jam version.

name: Vheda
summary: Dive into the story of Vheda, a 2D hack 'n' slash where Vheda, born from the Light, must restore peace in Cilizam with the help of Smor, her loyal companion. Face dark enemies and uncover secrets on an epic journey.

name: VHScape
summary:
You find yourself trapped in a haunted VHS rental store, can you survive their twisted games and escape?

A short horror-themed walking simulator and memory game inspired by our memories of VHS stores and by similar anomaly games, with an average play time of 1-4 hours.

name: VHS Vermin
summary: Step into a grotesque 80s B-Movie nightmare in VHS> Vermin. With nowhere to run and limited ammo, you must fight through relentless hordes of mutated horrors. Every shadow hides something vile — your only hope is to annihilate anything that moves.

name: VHS Romance
summary: Be kind, rewind… and fall in love. Summer ’86 in a small U.S. town: save a cozy VHS shop from a corporate chain, choose your girl, and help a secret dropout shoot his first film. Six heroines, 14 endings, one last take.

name: VHSMan
summary: "Alice decides to watch a VHS she found in the dumpster 6 months ago and crazy stuff happens!" A Visual Novel about a magical VHS tape

name: VHS
summary: VHS, the most retro and nostalgic Idle game!

name: Vholume
summary: Vholume is a melancholic first-person parkour adventure set in a dystopian brutalist city where bureaucracy turns a simple task into an odyssey.

name: VHS Bodycam: The Torture Machine
summary:
The following transcript is not authorized for distribution:

The Oakwood Institute of Science reported the captivity of 26 students and faculty who all entered a building on campus, but have not come out on the morning of April 9th, 2002.

Police were notified at 6:42pm on the same day and promptly surrounded the building which held the missing students. Whether this is an active hostage situation or a gas leak is unknown.

A Swat team is on standby along with a chemist equipped with a remote controlled rover to analyze air toxicity.

We are still awaiting an update from the police chief about the fate of the missing students and faculty.

[This transcript was written on April 9th, 2002 at approximately 8:30pm]

name: VHS Collection: Goodnight Me
summary: VHS Collection: Goodnight Me is a short horror game where reality blurs with nightmares over five eerie days. Experience strange events, unsettling dreams, and unravel a chilling mystery in a remote house. Can you survive the madness, or will the nightmare consume you?

name: VHSoverdose
summary: VHSoverdose is an unrelenting assault of outlandish action, served up with thick juicy slice of anatomical annihilation! Set inside of the confides of a simple 80's Arcade Machine... Or is it?

name: VHAIP
summary: Vhaip is a scary survival game in VR. Survive to raptors in co-op or solo up to 4 players. Survive or kill are the only way ! Will you survive ?

name: VHHS: Backrooms
summary: VHHS:Backrooms is a psychological horror game with a storyline. The first game in the Volter series. In this part you have to control the fate of a scientist, who got into the world of backstage for some circumstances. His life completely depends on you.

name: VHS, 1986
summary: A short horror game about a box of VHS tapes and a caller that doesn't want you to watch them.

name: V-Hunter Puzzler DX
summary: Hunt a plethora of monsters using unique items in a dynamic turn-based grid puzzler! Complete the bite-sized levels in as few turns as possible and help V-Hunter defeat the evil vampire Alric!

name: VHS Platform: 2D
summary: Our player will need to use his skills and go through all the obstacles present in each stage. With each stage that the player passes, the levels will become more and more difficult, are you up for the challenge?

name: VHS Slaughter
summary: VHS Slaughter is a game attempting to recreate the atmosphere of VHS 80's films and classic PSX horror games.

name: VHS vs. Betamax
summary: Decide which is the superior format in this Vaporwave inspired 4 player fighting game!
